statements: SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations;
SELECT technician_id, installation_date FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE technician_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_activity FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE maintenance_activity IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, technician_id FROM telecom_equipment_installations ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, installation_date FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE technician_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_activity, technician_id FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM telecom_equipment WHERE regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_equipment WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_activities WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment WHERE regulatory_compliance = true ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_equipment WHERE location LIKE '%US%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_activities WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT e.id, e.location, m.maintenance_type FROM telecom_equipment e JOIN maintenance_activities m ON e.id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.id, COUNT(m.id) AS maintenance_count FROM telecom_equipment e LEFT JOIN maintenance_activities m ON e.id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.id HAVING maintenance_count > 5 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations;
SELECT equipment_type, installation_location FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT standard_name FROM regulatory_safety_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_activities WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT id, equipment_type, installation_location, inspector_id FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE installation_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM telecom_equipment_installations;
SELECT equipment_type, installation_location FROM telecom_equipment_installations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT installation_date, equipment_type FROM telecom_equipment_installations ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_activities WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, description FROM regulatory_safety_standards;
SELECT * FROM installations;
SELECT id, location FROM installations WHERE equipment_type = 'Generator';
SELECT installation_date, location, equipment_type FROM installations ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_date FROM maintenance_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Inspection' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM regulatory_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT * FROM installations
SELECT id, location FROM installations WHERE equipment_type = 'Generator' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment_history GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC
SELECT i.location, m.activity_type, r.standard_name FROM installations i JOIN maintenance_activities m ON i.id = m.installation_id JOIN regulatory_standards r ON m.id = r.id
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT id, equipment_type, installation_date FROM Equipment;
SELECT location, maintenance_status FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM MaintenanceActivities GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT id, equipment_type, location FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = true;
SELECT e.id, e.equipment_type, e.installation_date, r.description FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN RegulatoryStandards r ON e.id = r.id;
SELECT e.id, e.equipment_type, m.activity_type, m.activity_date FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceActivities m ON e.id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT e.id, e.equipment_type, e.installation_date, s.report_date, s.report_description FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN SafetyReports s ON e.id = s.equipment_id;
